verses.roman:
adhyayana-līlā prabhura dāsa-vṛndāvana
'caitanya-maṅgale' kaila vistāri varṇana

synonyms: adhyayana-līlā—pastimes of studying; prabhura—of the Lord; dāsa-vṛndāvana—Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura; caitanya-maṅgale—in his book Caitanya-maṅgala; kaila—has done; vistāri—elaborately; varṇana—explanation.
translation: In his book Caitanya-maṅgala [which later became Caitanya-bhāgavata], Śrīla Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura very elaborately described the Lord's pastimes of study.

purport.content: The Caitanya-bhāgavata, Ādi-līlā, chapters Four, Six, Seven, Eight, Nine and Ten, are a good reference for the studious pastimes of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
